creator: pretee@fdny.nyc.gov
text: We are running two Windows 2008R2 servers with Adobe ColdFusion in a load balanced configuration. One of the two servers has consistently had a service interuption at intervals of two months where the web service seems to hang thus impacting page delivery. We are now experiencing the same issue with the second server. A restart of the server and services solves the issue. Being this happens intermittmently its unpredictable and impacting service.
